thread.title: The names of the women most likely to get engaged on Valentine's Day - and the men who'll pop the question
thread.title_full: The names of the women most likely to get engaged on Valentine's Day - and the men who'll pop the question

author: Zahra Mulroy
title: The names of the women most likely to get engaged on Valentine's Day - and the men who'll pop the question
text:
Natalie was delighted with Stevens proposal Share     
Are you an Amy, Emma, Gemma or Lisa? 
Is your partner called either Lee, John, Craig or Michael? 
Because, without wanting you to get too excited, you may be getting engaged today. No big deal. 
At least, according to You & Your Wedding you may. They have calculated which brave men are most likely to pop the question on Valentine's Day, and which women will be saying 'yes'. 
To get this list, the researchers looked at the average age of brides and grooms in the UK, then deducting the average engagement time. 
To identify specific names, the researchers looked up which names were the most popular in the period those people were born, which turns out to be between 1980 and 1984, and were able to come up with a list by comparing the names. 
Anyway, now the science part is done and dusted, on to the list - could your name be on there? Her names is probably Sarah (Photo: Getty) The girls.
